resources.string: The primary purpose of this app is to provide a watchface for Wear OS by Google smartwatches. But on smartphones and tablets it should be useful at least a little bit, too. So it can show the current date and time. Nothing more. Nothing less.
This app contains NO advertisements. The app does NOT access, process, store or send personal data.
This app uses one font of the C64 TrueType Fonts Collection by style64.org. Please find their license at https://style64.org/c64-truetype/license
